title: Healthcare CEOs Convene in Chicago to Drive Health Transformation
text:
Healthcare CEOs Convene in Chicago to Drive Health Transformation [October 12, 2015] Tweet 
Nearly 500 senior health leaders -70 percent of whom are C-Suite - from around the globe and 10 industry sectors will convene in Chicago on October 12-14 for the Oliver Wyman Health Innovation Summit . The explicit goal of the third annual gathering is to directly tackle what's needed to deliver the personalized, integrated, preventative, real-time, transparent, and affordable healthcare that consumers deserve and will soon. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151012005041/en/ 
"Our goal for the Summit is to showcase meaningful innovations in healthcare, explore what new disruptions are likely to come next, and share leadership lessons learned regarding transforming your business during times of major change," says Terry Stone, global managing partner of Oliver Wyman's Health & Life ( News - Alert ) Sciences practice. "The converging forces of a true 'retail' consumer market and emerging digital innovations will disrupt traditional healthcare on par with what ATMs did to banking, Netflix to video entertainment, or Uber to the taxi industry." 
The two-and-a-half days of sessions directly focus on the four forces that will accelerate the shift to Health Market 2.0, which include the underlying leadership imperative. Attendees will gain a 360-degree view of the future of healthcare through a dynamic agenda that includes: Experiential exhibits of today's most innovative models presented by Independence Blue Cross, Comcast ( News - Alert ), Optum, Rite Aid and HealthSpot . Perspectives from leaders across the industry , including Dr. Karen DeSalvo, National Coordinator for Health Information Technology ( ONC ) and Acting Assistant Secretary for Health, U.S. Health and Human Services , and Gln Tullman, CEO of Livongo Health. A speaker roster that includes nearly 20 senior healthcare leaders who are pioneering a shift toward Health Market 2.0, including Stephen Hemsley, CEO of UnitedHealth Group , Marcus Osborne, VP of Health and Wellness Payer Relations, Walmart , and leading investors from Venture Valkyrie, InterWest Partners, General Catalyst Partners, and General Atlantic. Immersion tours of Chicago's most innovative organizations, including: Allscripts, NantHealth, Rush University Medical Center, AVIA, MATTER, and1871, One Medical Group, and Sandbox Industries. Live streaming from GuideWell Insights lounge of interviews with speakers and guests throughout the summit. "This October, Chicago will be the hub of a frank assessment of the need for and the implications of convergence," said Tom Main, founder of the Oliver Wyman ( News - Alert ) Health Innovation Center. "Health Market 2.0 is not possible without new ecosystems that bring much-needed capabilities to change from sick care to well care." 
The Oliver Wyman Health Innovation Summit is supported by our platinum sponsor, Alignment Healthcare; silver sponsors, Allscripts, GuideWell, Medfusion, Rite Aid, Softheon and Welltok; bronze sponsors, Ascension, CHESS, HudsonAlpha Institute for Biotechnology, Livongo Health, Magellan ( News - Alert ) Healthcare, Mosaic Health Solutions, Motive Medical Intelligence, and Strand Life Sciences; supporting sponsors, Edifecs, Optum, Pfizer, Syapse, and Zipongo; and contributor sponsors, American Well, HealthSparq, Lumeris, PharmMD, Valence Health, and Vitals. 
For more information on the event, including a complete agenda and roster of guest speakers, please visit the event website . Follow the event on Twitter ( News - Alert ) @OliverWyman and #OWHIC. 
About Oliver Wyman and its Health & Life Sciences Practice 
With offices in 50+ cities across 26 countries, Oliver Wyman is a global leader in management consulting that combines deep industry knowledge with specialized expertise in strategy, operations, risk management, and organization transformation. Oliver Wyman is a wholly owned subsidiary of Marsh & McLennan Companies [NYSE:MMC]. For more information on Oliver Wyman visit www.oliverwyman.com . Follow Oliver Wyman on Twitter @OliverWyman . 
Oliver Wyman's Health & Life Sciences practice serves clients in the pharmaceutical, biotechnology, medical devices, provider, and payer sectors with strategic, operational, and organizational advice. Deep healthcare knowledge and capabilities allow the practice to deliver fact-based solutions. 
Oliver Wyman launched the Health Innovation Center ( OWHIC ) in 2011 dedicated to promoting positive change in healthcare. OWHIC champions innovation by disseminating proven innovations; envisioning market-based solutions to today's and tomorrow's challenges; and establishing a cross-industry community of thought-leaders to share and shape ideas.
